name: Kanri
title: kanriapp.com
shortDescription: Kanri is a modern, minimalist Kanban board app designed for offline use. It supports Windows, Mac, and Linux, providing a simple alternative to online tools like Trello. Ideal for individuals or teams looking to manage tasks without internet dependency, Kanri allows users to organize tasks visually with customizable boards, columns, and cards. It's perfect for those seeking privacy, ease of use, and efficient task management.
pros: Customizable themes and rich text support
No setup required, easy to start
cons: Lacks collaboration features of online tools

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Trello
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Popular online Kanban tool with collaboration
